abstract: Online release of top-secret code developed by National Security Agency to break into computer networks of foreign governments and espionage targets is raising concerns among intelligence agencies that America's elite operatives have been hacked; speculation surrounds identity of Shadow Brokers, group that released code, with some guessing they are linked to Russia.

headline.print_headline: Top-Secret Code Released by Hackers Points to Breach at N.S.A.
headline.main: ‘Shadow Brokers’ Leak Raises Alarming Question: Was the N.S.A. Hacked?

snippet: Outside experts said the data contained what appeared to be genuine samples of the top-secret code used in the production of the N.S.A.’s custom-built malware....
lead_paragraph: Outside experts said the data contained what appeared to be genuine samples of the top-secret code used in the production of the N.S.A.’s custom-built malware.
